subject: Fashion
title: Demna and Balenciaga's Street Influence
description: One-minute skill: Demna and Balenciaga's Street Influence.

hook.text: Balenciaga put trash bags on the runway. They cost $1,790 each.

buildup.text: Demna Gvasalia built his career on making the mundane feel luxurious.

discovery.text: Oversized hoodies, dad sneakers, and grocery bags became high fashion staples.

twist.text: Critics debate whether it's genius commentary or cynical trolling of wealth.

climax.text: Either way, Demna proved streetwear logic now drives luxury design.

punchline.text: When a trash bag costs $1,790, fashion is the joke and the art.

quiz.question: What is Demna's signature design approach at Balenciaga?
options: Elevating everyday and mundane items into luxury
